welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Wells, a charming town known for its picturesque New England scenery and rich history. We hope you'll explore and enjoy all that our beautiful city has to offer during your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sanford Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Sanford Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free Wi-Fi network throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pease International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Pease International Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at International Jetport Airport is the hub for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal handles all freight and logistics operations at International Jetport Airport.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by connecting to the designated network.
